scenario_text.value:
Oh my gosh, it’s... It must be Kaito that did
this!
What is it, Aoi?!
Over here, Takuma! Look!

Is that an enemy? Looks like someone took
care of it already...

It must have been Kaito! I caught a glimpse
of someone deeper in the forest.
Really?!

I think the person I saw was Kaito. There was
a shadow that looked like Dracumon, too.
But they disappeared so fast...
Which way did they go?!
That way, deeper into the woods.

(That’s the opposite of the direction to the
school.)

(We should divide in two. One group to tell
the others, and one to follow Kaito.)

(Aoi should probably go with the ones looking
for Kaito...)

(But she’s so desperate to find him, I feel
like she might do something rash.)
Listen, Takuma. Agumon.
Huh? What?!
I’ll go get everyone.

I want you two to follow after Kaito and
Dracumon.

Are you sure? I know you’re worried about
him...

And you’re worried about trusting me with
that. It’s written all over your face.
Um...

We don’t have the time to discuss this.
Please, Takuma.

(I know she wants to, but she’s counting on
me to do it instead.)
(I can’t say no to that.)
(How should I respond to Aoi?)
We’ll find him.
I’m on it.
Are you sure?
We’ll find him.
All right, I’ll find him. I promise.

And in case we find him before everyone gets
back, we’ll be waiting here.
I knew you’d say that, Takuma.
Please keep him safe, Agumon.
Of course! Good luck informing the others!
Let’s get going then, Labramon!
Roger that!
I’m on it.
I’m on it. We’ll find him!

Sorry to ask so much of you. I’ll be back
before long.
Let’s hurry and get this over with, Aoi.
Right! Thanks, Takuma.
Are you sure?

Are you sure you don’t want to go after him
yourself?
Huh? Why would you say that?

You’re really focused, so I don’t doubt you
can do it. And I thought you might want to...

Can’t you see she’s trying to be thoughtful
and restrain herself? Sheesh!

Don’t mess with her like that! We don’t have
the time!

Sorry! Me and Agumon will go after Kaito
then...
Ugh! Come on, Aoi, let’s go!

Sorry to ask so much of you. I’ll be back
before long.
Thanks for the help, Takuma! And Agumon, too!
Sure thing! You can count on us!
